s.text: If you've been reading the 22nd Amendment too, it must now be tempting to use your magazine to at least help prop Clinton up until the two-year deadline is past, so Gore can run twice.

If you've been reading the 22nd Amendment too, it must now be tempting to use your magazine to at least help prop Clinton up until the two-year deadline is past, so Gore can run twice.

If Gore wants to maximize his potential years in the presidency, Clinton has to hang on until at least Jan. 21, 1999, so Gore can serve less than two years of Clinton's term and then two full terms of his own ...
